storyPoints.name: MotivatingAction
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe an incident which will prompt the main character to action and become the plot of a detective story

storyPoints.name: TheCulminationOfTheFirstPart
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe the culmination of the first part.

storyPoints.name: ObstacleOne
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe an unexpected event.

storyPoints.name: BigTwist
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe an unexpected plot twist in the story that will greatly change the situation and the attitude of the characters towards it.

storyPoints.name: Disaster
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe a situation that is catastrophic for the characters. Describe the current crisis.

storyPoints.name: ActIICulmination
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe the culmination of the second part, the heroes have hope.

storyPoints.name: ActIIICulmination
storyPoints.body: Continue the novel. Describe the culmination of the third part.

storyPoints.name: Enouement
storyPoints.body: Finish the novel. Describe a plot denouement that will lead to a happy ending.
